openjsip.proxy.plugins

Class RegisterPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • openjsip.proxy.plugins.RegisterPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodPlugin

    public class RegisterPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodPlugin
    Method plugin to handle REGISTER requests. This plugin connects to Registrar via RMI and forwards it REGISTER request.
